resources.string:
Welcome to the Tutorial! This is where we will be giving you instructions as to how to use this app.

 1. Please put on the shirt and ensure that the pads are attached to your skin as shown below.

Ensure that there are no excess lotion or oils on your skin to ensure better connection of the pads.

 2. Press the START button on the ECG GRAPH page to start real time monitoring.

 HOME tab: Credits.

 EMERGENCY tab: Location of emergency button to force calling.

 ECG GRAPH tab: Location of START button and real time graph updates.

 CONTACT INFO tab: Input Primary and Secondary contact information. Option to call emergency contacts inside app.

Grace Li
 Monica Nasralla
 Radu Baciu
 Youstina Abdelsayed
 Special Thanks to Center for Simulation-Based Learning
